verses.verse: How <S%H835>blessed<s%> are those whose <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H8549>blameless,<s%> Who <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
How <S%H835>blessed<s%> are those who <S%H5341>observe<s%> His <S%H9381>testimonies,<s%> Who <S%H1875>seek<s%> Him with <S%H3605>all<s%> [their] <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
They <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H6466>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H9390>unrighteousness;<s%> They <S%H1980>walk<s%> in His <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H6680>ordained<s%> Thy <S%H6490>precepts,<s%> That we should <S%H8104>keep<s%> [them] <S%H3966>diligently.<s%>
<S%H305>Oh<s%> that my <S%H1870>ways<s%> may be <S%H3559>established<s%> To <S%H8104>keep<s%> Thy <S%H2706>statutes!<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> I shall not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> When I <S%H5027>look<s%> upon <S%H3605>all<s%> Thy <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
I shall <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee with <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart,<s%> When I <S%H3925>learn<s%> Thy <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>
I shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> Thy <S%H2706>statutes;<s%> Do not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me <S%H5704>utterly<s%><S%H3966>!<s%>
<S%H4100>How<s%> can a <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H2135>keep<s%> his <S%H734>way<s%> <S%H2135>pure<s%>? By <S%H8104>keeping<s%> [it] according to Thy <S%H1647>word.<s%>
With <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> I have <S%H1875>sought<s%> Thee; Do not let me <S%H7686>wander<s%> from Thy <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
Thy <S%H565>word<s%> I have <S%H6845>treasured<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> That I may not <S%H2398>sin<s%> against Thee.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> art Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me Thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
With my <S%H8193>lips<s%> I have <S%H5608>told<s%> of <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of Thy <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
I have <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of Thy <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> As <S%H5921>much<s%> as in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1952>riches.<s%>
I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on Thy <S%H6490>precepts,<s%> And <S%H5027>regard<s%> Thy <S%H734>ways.<s%>
I shall <S%H8173>delight<s%> in Thy <S%H2708>statutes;<s%> I shall not <S%H7911>forget<s%> Thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H1580>Deal<s%> <S%H1580>bountifully<s%> with Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> That I may <S%H2421>live<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> Thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H1540>Open<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> that I may <S%H5027>behold<s%> <S%H6381>Wonderful<s%> <S%H6381>things<s%> from Thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
I am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in the <S%H776>earth;<s%> Do not <S%H5641>hide<s%> Thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> from me.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H1638>crushed<s%> with <S%H8375>longing<s%> <S%H413>After<s%> Thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times.<s%>
Thou dost <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> the <S%H2086>arrogant,<s%> the <S%H779>cursed,<s%> Who <S%H7686>wander<s%> from Thy <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
<S%H1556>Take<s%> <S%H1556>away<s%> <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and <S%H937>contempt<s%> from me, For I <S%H5341>observe<s%> Thy <S%H9381>testimonies.<s%>
<S%H1571>Even<s%> though <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H1696>talk<s%> against me, Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7878>meditates<s%> on Thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
Thy <S%H9381>testimonies<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> are my <S%H8191>delight;<s%> [They are] my <S%H376>counselors.<s%> <S%H6098><s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1692>cleaves<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust;<s%> <S%H2421>Revive<s%> me according to Thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
I have <S%H5608>told<s%> of my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and Thou hast <S%H6030>answered<s%> me; <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me Thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
Make me <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of Thy <S%H6490>precepts,<s%> So I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on Thy <S%H6381>wonders.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1811>weeps<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of <S%H8424>grief;<s%> <S%H6965>Strengthen<s%> me according to Thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H5493>Remove<s%> the <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> from me, And <S%H2603>graciously<s%> <S%H2603>grant<s%> me Thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> the <S%H530>faithful<s%> <S%H1870>way;<s%> I have <S%H9586>placed<s%> Thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> [before me.]
I <S%H1692>cleave<s%> to Thy <S%H5715>testimonies;<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> do not <S%H954>put<s%> me to <S%H954>shame!<s%>
I shall <S%H7323>run<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of Thy <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> For Thou wilt <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> my <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H3384>Teach<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of Thy <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> And I shall <S%H5341>observe<s%> it to the <S%H6118>end.<s%>
<S%H995>Give<s%> me <S%H995>understanding,<s%> that I may <S%H5341>observe<s%> Thy <S%H8451>law,<s%> And <S%H8104>keep<s%> it with <S%H3605>all<s%> [my] <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Make me <S%H1869>walk<s%> in the <S%H5410>path<s%> of Thy <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> For I <S%H2654>delight<s%> in it.
<S%H5186>Incline<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to Thy <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> And not to [dishonest] <S%H1215>gain.<s%>
<S%H5674>Turn<s%> <S%H5674>away<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H7200>looking<s%> at <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> And <S%H2421>revive<s%> me in Thy <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
<S%H6965>Establish<s%> Thy <S%H565>word<s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> As that <S%H834>which<s%> produces <S%H3374>reverence<s%> for Thee.
<S%H5674>Turn<s%> <S%H5674>away<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3025>dread,<s%> For Thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> are <S%H2896>good.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H8373>long<s%> for Thy <S%H6490>precepts;<s%> <S%H2421>Revive<s%> me through Thy <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
May Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%> also <S%H935>come<s%> to me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thy <S%H8668>salvation<s%> according to Thy <S%H565>word;<s%>
So I shall <S%H6030>have<s%> an <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H1697><s%> for him who <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> me, For I <S%H982>trust<s%> in Thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
And do not <S%H5337>take<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5704>utterly<s%> <S%H3966><s%> out of my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> For I <S%H3176>wait<s%> for Thine <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%>
So I will <S%H8104>keep<s%> Thy <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> <S%H5769>Forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
And I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> at <S%H7342>liberty,<s%> For I <S%H1875>seek<s%> Thy <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
I will also <S%H1696>speak<s%> of Thy <S%H9381>testimonies<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%> And shall not be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
And I shall <S%H8173>delight<s%> in Thy <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> I <S%H157>love.<s%>
And I shall <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H3709>hands<s%> to Thy <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> I <S%H157>love;<s%> And I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on Thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> In <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast made me <S%H3176>hope.<s%>
<S%H384>This<s%> is my <S%H5165>comfort<s%> in my <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> That Thy <S%H565>word<s%> has <S%H2421>revived<s%> me.
The <S%H2086>arrogant<s%> <S%H5704>utterly<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H9238>deride<s%> me, [Yet] I do not <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> from Thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
I have <S%H2142>remembered<s%> Thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> from of <S%H5769>old,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And <S%H5162>comfort<s%> myself.
<S%H2152>Burning<s%> <S%H2152>indignation<s%> has <S%H270>seized<s%> me <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> Who <S%H5800>forsake<s%> Thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
Thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%> are my <S%H2158>songs<s%> In the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H4033>pilgrimage.<s%>
O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I <S%H2142>remember<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> And <S%H8104>keep<s%> Thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
<S%H384>This<s%> has <S%H1961>become<s%> mine, That I <S%H5341>observe<s%> Thy <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is my <S%H2506>portion;<s%> I have <S%H559>promised<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> Thy <S%H1697>words.<s%>
I <S%H9134>entreated<s%> Thy <S%H6440>favor<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> [my] <S%H3820>heart;<s%> Be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me according to Thy <S%H565>word.<s%>
I <S%H2803>considered<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> And <S%H7725>turned<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> to Thy <S%H9381>testimonies.<s%>
I <S%H2363>hastened<s%> and did not <S%H4102>delay<s%> To <S%H8104>keep<s%> Thy <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
The <S%H9112>cords<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H9388>encircled<s%> me, [But] I have not <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> Thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
At <S%H2676>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%> I shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> to <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee <S%H5921>Because<s%> of Thy <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%>
I am a <S%H2270>companion<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> those <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> Thee, And of those who <S%H8104>keep<s%> Thy <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me Thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H9185>well<s%> with Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> according to Thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H3925>Teach<s%> me <S%H2898>good<s%> <S%H2940>discernment<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> For I <S%H539>believe<s%> in Thy <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
<S%H2962>Before<s%> I was <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> I <S%H7683>went<s%> <S%H7683>astray,<s%> But <S%H6258>now<s%> I <S%H8104>keep<s%> Thy <S%H565>word.<s%>
Thou art <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3190>doest<s%> <S%H3190>good;<s%> <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me Thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
The <S%H2086>arrogant<s%> have <S%H2950>forged<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me; With <S%H3605>all<s%> [my] <S%H3820>heart<s%> I will <S%H5341>observe<s%> Thy <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2954>covered<s%> with <S%H2459>fat,<s%> [But] I <S%H8173>delight<s%> in Thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
It is <S%H2895>good<s%> for me that I was <S%H6031>afflicted,<s%> That I may <S%H3925>learn<s%> Thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of Thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> to me <S%H4480>Than<s%> <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> [pieces].
Thy <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> me and <S%H3559>fashioned<s%> me; <S%H995>Give<s%> me <S%H995>understanding,<s%> that I may <S%H3925>learn<s%> Thy <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
May those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Thee <S%H7200>see<s%> me and be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I <S%H3176>wait<s%> for Thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
I <S%H3045>know,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that Thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are <S%H6664>righteous,<s%> And that in <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> Thou hast <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> me.
<S%H4994>O<s%> <S%H4994>may<s%> Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me, According to Thy <S%H565>word<s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
May Thy <S%H7356>compassion<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to me that I may <S%H2421>live,<s%> For Thy <S%H8451>law<s%> is my <S%H8191>delight.<s%>
May the <S%H2086>arrogant<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> for they <S%H5791>subvert<s%> me with a <S%H8267>lie;<s%> [But] I shall <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on Thy <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
May those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Thee <S%H7725>turn<s%> to me, Even those who <S%H3045>know<s%> Thy <S%H9381>testimonies.<s%>
May my <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H8549>blameless<s%> in Thy <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> That I may not be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3615>languishes<s%> for Thy <S%H8668>salvation;<s%> I <S%H3176>wait<s%> for Thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> [with longing] for Thy <S%H565>word,<s%> While I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4970>"When<s%> wilt Thou <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me?"
<S%H3588>Though<s%> I have <S%H1961>become<s%> like a <S%H4997>wineskin<s%> in the <S%H7008>smoke,<s%> I do not <S%H7911>forget<s%> Thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>

<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H4100>many<s%> are the <S%H3117>days<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>? <S%H4970>When<s%> wilt Thou <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> on those who <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me?
The <S%H2086>arrogant<s%> have <S%H3738>dug<s%> <S%H7882>pits<s%> for me, [Men] <S%H834>who<s%> are not in accord with Thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> Thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> are <S%H530>faithful;<s%> They have <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> me with a <S%H8267>lie;<s%> <S%H5826>help<s%> me!
They <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H3615>destroyed<s%> me on <S%H776>earth,<s%> But as for me, I did not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> Thy <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
<S%H2421>Revive<s%> me according to Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> So that I may <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> of Thy <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H5769>Forever,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thy <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H5324>settled<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> [continues] throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations;<s%> Thou didst <S%H3559>establish<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it <S%H5975>stands.<s%>
They <S%H5975>stand<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> according to Thine <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>things<s%> are Thy <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
<S%H3884>If<s%> Thy <S%H8451>law<s%> had not been my <S%H8191>delight,<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> I would have perished in my <S%H6>affliction.<s%>
I will <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> Thy <S%H6490>precepts,<s%> For by them Thou hast <S%H2421>revived<s%> me.
I am Thine, <S%H3467>save<s%> me; For I have <S%H1875>sought<s%> Thy <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6960>wait<s%> for me to destroy me; I shall <S%H6>diligently<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> Thy <S%H995>testimonies.<s%>
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a <S%H7093>limit<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8502>perfection;<s%> Thy <S%H4687>commandment<s%> is <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H7342>broad.<s%>
O <S%H4100>how<s%> I <S%H157>love<s%> Thy <S%H8451>law!<s%> It is my <S%H7881>meditation<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
Thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H2449>make<s%> me <S%H2449>wiser<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> my <S%H340>enemies,<s%> For they are <S%H5769>ever<s%> mine.
